comments.comment: Let’s go on more adventures!
I love these new Pewd videos so much, it feels like discovering him for the first time back in 2012
This is old-school YouTube vibes and it honestly makes me so happy. Good job Pewds
I love how pewdiepie is so respectful to things. i can see how he is trying his best to respect the culture and the locals

Pewds saying "I did it!" as he walks into the house and Marzia going "you did? Yay!!!" Is just the most wholesome thing I've ever witnessed
1:35
Love these Japanese vlogs! Hope to see more.

"It's So Ugly." "Worst Car Ever made"
Me who owns a Kei Car: 
Felix Definitely likes it  /copium

So happy to see them settling in and hanging out with the TT boiz.
Home is where the heart is, and I can definitely tell that you and Marzia's hearts are in Japan. I'm so happy for y'all!
The fact that he can just comfortably be a human in public now instead of being flocked genuinely is so damn nice to see. I bet its such a relief x
Welcome to Japan Felix and Marzia. Hope you both enjoy your time here.
I could watch videos like this from Pewds for hours and not get bored, it feels like we’re being included on his lil journey and I love that.
Brings dogs to a cat temple
This is awesome, the tone of the video is 100% positive and happiness
Damn he's smiling like there's no tomorrow. I'm so happy for him and it even inspired me to get back on learning Japanese. I don't mind vlogs like this it's just genuine happiness

A Swedish man, his Italian wife, their 2 China breed-originated dogs, living in Japan, and speaking in English. 

If it isn't Mr. Worldwide!

Hey, I’m a Canadian kid living in Japan with my family for the next year. I’m really looking forward to your Japan videos! I live and go to school in Matsusaka in Mie prefecture but I will come to Tokyo some day for sure! If you need any help with translating/customs in japan, I’d love to help!
It's nice being in a new place where everything is a "first" it makes you feel like a kid rediscovering how to live, it's really cool honestly.

As someone who has lived for some time in Japan, go with the smaller car. It doesn't need to be a K-car, but the big Toyota will be hella stressful to park and navigate in most urban places. Additionally, most roads in Japan are in good condition, so unless you're planning on driving into the mountains in Hokkaido, go for the smaller more urban car. Toyota still looks cool though haha

It's such a good feeling, watching pewds genuinely smiling and excited. This is huge for him and I'm probably not alone but I almost feel like we're apart of this somehow. This isn't entertainment anymore we're just witnessing Felix's and Marzia's journey and I couldn't be more happy for him.

日本へようこそ！🇯🇵

こんなに大きい影響力を持った方が来てくれて嬉しいです。

ぜひ、歌舞伎町で遊んで動画にして下さい
love to see you happy pewds ️
These are great! Would love to see ya visit some smaller villages and see the culture!

0:30 mans got that Minecraft car

Nah but seriously I’m so happy for you and Marzia for finally moving to Japan! I’m loving these videos of your journey to Japan and while being there. Keep being awesome!!
Seeing you both having fun together is one of the most wholesome things I saw this year. Thank you for this awesome video and, hopefully, every other video you two, all of you will make together.

You know, it's heartwarming to see videos of small things that someone finds enjoyable, like driving a car, tying up cardboard, and getting a strike. It makes Felix seem so much more human then other online personalities.
It feels so surreal to see him walking on the streets of Japan not as a tourist but an actual resident living there, wow. I feel so happy and proud for both of you and marzia!

I honestly haven't watched Pewds in the last year and a half, but seeing him SO happy and remembering the Pewds back in 2012, to now, it's so much growth that it feels like we're right there enjoying with him. I still love Pewds with all my heart and hope he has a wonderful time in Japan!!

Hey happy to have you here, I'm a long term resident myself and maybe you'll be too :)

That butterfly knife though, I hope it's completely blunt because it's SO illegal in Japan and will get you a 7day+ trip in jail and then quick sentencing for fines if police catch you in your possession. This includes the car. Put it in a lockable box with fishing gear at the back of the car if you really need to have it with you.

Great first video out in Japan! You even drove in Japan before me!! So cool that you can experience the normal life here and now you have great friends to spend time with!! I'm excited to see more your adventure here!!
I'm back to watching every new Felix video that comes out, and it feels good bros :'D
It’s incredible how Felix has been able to remain so humble after all his success it is truly inspiring.

Train intervals are very short in Japan!  (In Tokyo, it is originally 1 every 3 to 5 minutes) Since you do not know when the railroad crossing will be, it is dangerous if you do not pause before the railroad crossing and check the safety
Crazy to be watching this guy since i was  like 8 and im 19 and in college now ahahaha. Nice to see him get his happy break :) Would love to see more of these Japan vlogs every now and then!
Seeing his genuine reaction to everything and his optimism is so pure and sweet. Really happy he shared this with us.

Felix: “My wardrobe is very outdated”
Marzia: *has drip beyond repair*
I lived in Japan for 3 years and watching this really brings me back. Miss it so much. Gonna visit at some point. Hope you're enjoying life there as much as I did.
marzia just has a really nice sense of fashion. i've never not liked her outfit every time she appears in any of felix's vids. it's just calming to look at and fits the colour of her hair too well
Marzia’s genuine happiness when she gets into the car at 1:47 ️

It's impossible not to like you and Marzia, honestly you both look such nice, gentle and genuine people. I'm really glad you finally had the chance to move to Japan like you wanted. Your dogs are so loved and we can tell, plus they are soooo cute! Hope you have a wonderful life filled with all you want and need.

sometimes I go back and watch Pewds' videos of his trips to Japan because they always feel so calm and you can tell he's having a good time. now that he lives there I can't wait to see more videos like this
I can’t wait to hear him casually drop like fluent Japanese a few years from now without even thinking about it. Such a cool thing to be able to watch.
felt calm and relaxing

I keep getting emotional watching how he finally reached his dream of going to Japan. And looking at this 30ish year old man going to the arcade like some teenager having fun is real wholesome and sweet. Congratulations felix and marzia from all of us! we're truly happy for you!
12:38 love seeing my boys in Japan Stan Ehypen️
Seeing felix celebrate his milestones in finally moving to japan is hella wholesome
Get the smaller one, That would be most efficient way to go since there are many narrow roads and streets in Japan. I am so happy for y'all , hope to see more vlogs like this.

“Smackfull” “Smackpacked”

This is soooo fun!!!
I want more vlogs like this pls
From a man playing games in the kitchen, to now living his dream in Japan, you can’t help but fill with absolute happiness seeing him happy, and living his best life in Japan. We all love you pewds️
I’d definitely go for a smaller car. I know a ton of people who moved to japan and all regretted getting anything bigger after getting stuck on narrow streets or never finding parking

I've lived in Japan for 4 years now and I've never been so excited about going to the city office  
Pewdz it's so sweet and you reminded me living here can be fun!
You can feel that pewds is genuinely happy. I'm just glad that he's having fun in japan

After many years of watching pewds, his and marzias move to japan has made realise how emotionally invested I am into their lives. Im happy to see them figuring things out and excited to see whats next. Loving the japan content

I cant believe how humble Felix is compared to other creators, he is wealthy, he could have but a brand new super car if he wanted, he could not care about recycling but he still does,. He deserves everything he accomplished, congrats felix :D

This is one of the best videos he has made in a long time. For many reasons. They seem so happy, genuinely happy, fulfilled, living their life freely. 
And also these home made vlogs are so entertaining.

I can genuinely see how happy the two of them are in their new home. I'm so excited for their Japanese adventures! I know he'll be fluent soon. Once you're in the country and experiencing the culture and are around the language for long enough, it'll come naturally.
When you maxed out at level 99 and created a new character in a new realm. This must be what it feels like for Pewds. Please make more videos like this!!!

Watching him as an adult now makes my inner child happy. I remember when I watched him play happy wheels, he literally made me laugh so much when I was a kid. This brings me so much joy and inspiration to keep going.
This videos of just seeing Felix be genuily happy and chill make me so happy, im trully glad he and Marzia are having a good time, it fills me with joy!!!! :DDD

Man his vlogs are my favorite. It seems like he doesn’t really know what he’s doing, or he’s just so uncomfortable. But we get to see raw Pewds and honestly it’s awesome to just be happy for him after all of these years.

Felix is the most humble and well rounded human being whos also an online influencer. His outlook on life and his morals are top notch. He is genuinely my role model , always enjoyed you’re videos Felix and I’m sure I’ll continue too
these vlogs are so good

More of these please! saw you guys once in Oxford, can't believe you're gone now!

as for the car, I'd take a small one, a car is of no use if you can't park it anywhere.

watching him since 6th grade now i’m a sophomore in college man, time flies by watching a man come up to being able to see him do good makes me happy and kinda sad cause he’s slowly getting old  but man glad to see him happy
I feel like a dad watching his son, just smiling and being proud of him.

Japan is really fun and your car looks really cute ngl, goodluck living in japan !!

from fellow overseas student

Ik a lot of you miss the old pewds,but personally this era of pewds is my favorite,its just so chill all good vibes,calming,i just feel so included in his life bcuz of these unedited simple videos,which just warms my heart
Love seeing you hang out with Joey! So many memories being created with these vlogs

I’ve never actually thought deeply about the fact of being in a new country with a totally different culture. Just watching this and putting myself in his shoes , I’d be pretty anxious and nervous. Its heart warming to see that everyone so far has been friendly and kind , looks like Japan is treating you well!

Felix's genuine happiness is very contagious, cant stop smilling watching these videos
you deserve it bro, you deserve it
Based on Google, pugs can live up to 12-15 and is really rare for them to live up to 20 yrs, Felix really did put love to Maya and Edgar, I really love that ️️

So glad you have Joey there, your "play date" had me smiling the whole time :) I'd be dragging Joey everywhere as my interpreter LOL. Glad you are happy there, I hope it's a great experience overall, and good luck on learning more Japanese! I'm super slow at learning the language, but I'm sure it helps to have actual Japanese all around lol.
I'm so happy seeing Felix in Japan, this was coming for a while, finally, the time is here!
There's something really soothing in pewds just enjoying his new life in Japan lol. Thx for the vlogs as usual.

Man used to watch him back when i was still a kid and growing up. It does feel great now that im older and seeing how much has changed for the channel and his life overall , really happy for you pewds its been years since i last watched a full video as well but seeing this new change I do enjoy watching you vlog haha its entertaining honestly
As someone who has 5 dogs I love seeing how much Felix’s dogs have always been taken care of. And that FJ was super cool.

It's humbling to see Pewds live like a normal person, some big shot internet celebs will pay for everything (translator etc..) I'm so happy seing this. I also stayed in Japan for 5 years straight and yes, when it comes to documentationthere's no such thing as online. Everything is paperworks.. 

Once they open the border I will fix my visa and move there again.
I don’t know why but I’m just smiling and happy with you while watching. I’m so glad you chose Japan, as we did, and it’s awesome that you’re sharing that with us! Arigatou
please make a series about vlog in japan, or a playlist of being in japan!!! would really enjoy it!!
Felix sounds positively giddy, especially when he’s talking about the differences in culture and things he has to learn (cardboard recycling, driving). So happy for him and Marzia!!

As someone that has lived in Japan, I'd recommend a smaller car. Either that or get two cars, one smaller and one that you like for trips out of town. The streets in Japan are usually more narrow and so the bigger cars can be a hassle to have when trying to fit in places with traffic coming the opposite way as well as parking. I remember some mountain roads that were narrow as hell with two way traffic and thinking about trying to be careful and fit those and not get really close to oncoming traffic cars gave me anxiety. Don't sleep on public transportation in Japan too. You can literally live without a car and just use public transit in Japan easily.

It's so funny to see how wholesome pewds has become now, I remember him most from the good ol days where he made gameplays and edgy controversial content. I do still miss some of that content, but I am glad that pewds always tries new things
i've missed these vlogs. So happy to be watching them again and I'm so glad to see you & Marzia adjusting well over there. Looking forward to more content you genuinely like making!!
so wholesome watching pewds accomplish these things. truly "good for him" moments that make my heart warm!
honestly pewdiepie seeing you beingg happy in Japan warms my heart I seriously hope I'll be truly as happy as you with your amazing wife and 2 pugs

As a Japanese, I know still not many people can speak English in Japan and life in Japan might not foreign people friendly. But I promise food is good, city is good, and people are good! 
Hope you enjoy Japan 🇯🇵

Japan is such an interesting country - and so clean and orderly too. Sad the Volvo couldn't go with you guys but it couldn't fit on the jet... But new country new car! The FJ or Land Cruiser are good. Can't go wrong with either.
